Competency Question / Fact: Analysis zones are spatial zones that are inspected
Analysis zones include movement zones and hole zones
Hazard zones are spatial zones that involve safety issues
Hazard zones include fall hazard zones so far
Hazard zones are implied by analisis zones. In particular, fall hazard zones are implied by movement zones and hole zones
Safety issues include an identifier, a name and a severity indicator
Safety issues are mitigared by  mitigation elements, which have to be distinguished from other elements
